list_definition.definition: to act or shout in great anger
(of wind, storms etc) to be violent; to blow with great force
(of battles, arguments etc) to be carried on with great violence

list_definition.definition: (of diseases etc) to spread quickly and affect many people

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Fever was raging through the town.
